micro4all 0.0.0.9000
  • Tutorial
  • github

Reference

All functions

alpha_diversity_table

Diversity indexes from endosphere samples of olive trees.

ancomloop()

ANCOM-BC analysis for multiple groups

ASV_final_table

ASV table from olive trees endosphere samples.

ASV_table_classified_raw

ASV table from olive trees endosphere samples without cleaning.

BalancedAnova()

Execute balanced ANOVA for multiple indexes

Betadispersion()

Multivariate homogeneity of groups dispersions for several distance methods.

dunnT()

Dunn's Test for multiple variables

kruskal.wallis()

Kruskal-Wallis Rank Sum Test for multiple variables

levene.test.alpha()

Levene's test for multiple variables

location_phyloseq

Phyloseq object containing classification, abundance, phylogenetic tree and ASV sequences from olive trees endosphere samples.

metadata

Metadata table.

MockCommunity()

Apply a cut-off based on Mock Community sequencing results

mock_composition

MOCK community composition table.

normalized_phyloseq

Phyloseq object containing classification, normalized abundance, phylogenetic tree and ASV sequences from olive trees endosphere samples.

PairwiseAdonisFun()

Pairwise multilevel comparison using adonis over multiple distance metrics

Permanova()

Permutational Multivariate Analysis of Variance along multiple distances metrics

Shapiro()

Shapiro-Wilk Normality test for multiple variables.

tree

Phylogenetic tree in phylo format.

Tukey.test()

Multiple comparisons for multiple variables: balanced and unbalanced.

UnbalancedAnova()

Performs unbalanced ANOVA on a lm model for several indexes

wilcoxon.test()

Pairwise Wilcoxon Rank Sum Tests for multiple variables
